document.full_text: france has discovered what appears to be part of an air france aircraft that crashed in the atlantic almost two years ago killing all 228 people on board, accident investigators said on sunday.
document.title: france says locates wreckage from atlantic crash
lines_and_colors: france has discovered what appears to be part of an air france aircraft that crashed in the atlantic almost two years ago killing all 228 people on board, accident investigators said on sunday.
